Reviews.Title: Amazing value
Reviews.Author: John C. Kulli "amateur historian"
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing for the price.  I purchased two of them, and 8GB memory cards for each.  I got the SIM cards from Consumer Cellular, which DOES NOT CHARGE for SIM cards, just for air time.  Consumer cellular does not support this model phone, but if you go to http://www.unlockit.co.nz you can find the Mobile Carrier Settings that will make it work.  Several reviews claim that the GPS doesn't work, and at first I thought that also.  But get the free app GPS test from the Google Play store and stand around outside for a while.  Eventually the phone picks up the satellites and you're in business.  One other detail:  the phone comes with the default British version of English.  You can change that with another free app.Several reviews complain about the keysize.  This is a minor flaw.Overall this phone does everything pretty well, and for $60 it's a steal.  Just be patient and be prepared to spend some time with Google figuring out how it all works.  There is no user manual.One last thing: there are two SIM card slots behind the battery, labelled SIM1 and SIM2.  The software has them reversed, so if the card is in the slot labelled SIM1, the OS thinks it's SIM2.  Again, a trivial problem.

Reviews.Title: JUST SAY NO!
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Late arrival. Never held a charge. Don't know if it really worked. Wishh I had believed the others. Donnnnnt'tttt'ttt buy this piece of......

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: couplafish
Reviews.Content: My 13yo niece LOVES this phone, Its great for her. mp3 player works great and she can browse online with it and her mom can set limits on it.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Shar
Reviews.Content: It worked well. Clear signal and good reception. Had to install a few apps to make more compatible with other androids.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: Please DON'T buy this phone.Its absolutely a nightmare!!! nothing works two pictures n no more memory cant use my sim card to go on line. cant see videos. it really suck suck suck from here to the end of the world n back n back n back. calling this seller they wont help u . they tell u to goto your provider for help. you call them again they will not pick up the phone again. They are frauds. DONT ORDER FROM SLIM SHARP N ABSOLUTELY DONT ORDER THIS PHONE. I guarantee u will absolutely regret it if u do. You will want to tear this phone to pieces coz it sucks so bad. Do yourselves a favor buy somewhere else........

Reviews.Title: Outdated junk
Reviews.Author: James Wilson
Reviews.Content: READ THIS REVIEW!! BUYER BEWARE!!My own phone broke completely on me a month before my free upgrade date so I decided to just buy something cheap to last me until then. And yeah, for a "smartphone" it's cheap, but I don't even think it was worth the $51 I paid for it. More like $25-30, If that.For one, fresh out the box, I tried to remove the back cover so I could put in the battery, of course, this is something the makers must have realized that the customer must do right? I mean, they sent the phone and the battery seperately, it's not like an Apple iOS device where the cover isn't removeable. Well the cover is so tight on there and it's so flimsy, the freaking cover cracked when I tried to remove it. Yes, 5 seconds out the box, and it was already breaking.Secondly, after I got past that ridiculousness, I figured "Alright, rough start, but it's still a pretty sleek looking device, can't be that bad. I put in the SIM card from my old phone and turn it on. First off, the startup for the phone looks and sounds like it's from a 2002 Nokia phone, which dropped my expectations even further, all the buttons look like they were made with Microsoft Paint, and the screen isn't a touchscreen, more like a punchscreen, because you damn near have to punch it to make it work, plus it feels like the screen is made of clear duct tape. And of course, IT DOESNT READ THE SIM. So, fearing breaking the phone again, I turn it off, remove the cover, and go "Oh well maybe if I put it in the second slot. Nope, still doesn't work. So I'm not sure how this is supposed to be useful, especially if most of the useful parts of the phone need the SIM to run.Thirdly, I decided to just suck it up and start exploring, I noticed the date said 1-15-2013, So they're only about a year and 6 months off. I go to fix it, and when I try to type in my local area, I realize...This damn thing's keyboard has the old-school setting. Yes, If I want to type "atlanta" I have to sit there and type 2-8-555-2-66-8-2. I haven't typed out words like that on a phone since I was a child, and I'd rather not go back to doing that.Overall, I wish I had made a different decision. If I wasn't laughing at how preposterously horrible this phone was I'd be probably be crying at the same. I had never heard of SVP before and I'm starting to figure out why, this is like some chinese piece of crap I wouldn't even pass off to a toddler to play with. I not only would not recommend this phone, I would specifically ask that people DONT buy this phone. SVP needs to focus their efforts somewhere else, cause phone making in the 21st century just aint their deal.

Reviews.Title: phone sucks.
Reviews.Author: Rawle
Reviews.Content: The phone suck, touch screen don't work properly. The phone is a very cheap knockoff.unsatisfied, don't buy.0 ratings.don't waste  your money.

Reviews.Title: A PIECE OF CRAP
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: JUNK ALL THE WAY SO DO NO BUY THIS CRAP NO MATTER HOW CHEAP IT IS.  You will get less than what u paid for.

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Nepherteri Chism
Reviews.Content: Screen occassionally freezes. No memory to download apps.  Downloaded facebook app and was unable to download anything else because of insufficient memory.  Otherwise, phone and text messaging works good.

Reviews.Title: About SVP-S580
Reviews.Author: Thelma Harwood
Reviews.Content: Very good gadget.However dual sim only facilitates one network even though it stated quad band. Not sure if the phone is entirely unlocked for both networks.Also my Whatsapp is an old version which does not upgrade even though it gives the option to download update. I'm hesitant to select unknown sources and allow non market applications.

Reviews.Title: Phone is garbage
Reviews.Author: Greg trame
Reviews.Content: The phone is cheap defective screen went out in yesterday (in less then a month of me getting it I hate this phone

Reviews.Title: Nice appearance , piss poor phone and service
Reviews.Author: harold hunter
Reviews.Content: The reason I gave this phone a 1 is due to its appearance , which I think is really nice.. However ,this is a absolute piece of crap ...don't waste your time and effort and more importantly your money buying this phone. Cant receive or send pics through messaging service. Cell carrier states it is in the phone internally. Called seller and got piss poor customer service. and no help at all. Given email address to contact their one and only tech person... who after 7 days has never responded.Lousy ......plain and simpleReturned it to purchase tin cans and wire.....

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE....
Reviews.Author: Sammy
Reviews.Content: you will be completely disappointed if you do. I bought it thinking I could switch the current phone service provider I have, but it did not work. It does not connect to my home wifi network. It does not recognize the sim I added to it. I am also disappointed with the overall functionality. Since this is an android phone I was expecting more functions, but this is no better than the current non-smart phone I have.BE SMART- this is no smart phone!!!

Reviews.Title: leave it where it is
Reviews.Author: S. Marble "Charlie"
Reviews.Content: this is nice to look at but can't get anything to work withit DO NOT buy this phone it sucks

Reviews.Title: great travel phone
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: the camera is not that great other then that the phone work well,and its a good travel phone and good battery life.

Reviews.Title: I got a bad one
Reviews.Author: Maurice Hamilton "rastacrab"
Reviews.Content: I got this white one for a friend & I'm thinking maybe I got a bad one.  The phone was easy to set up but it didn't last through the night.  My friend put the phone to charge and drift off to sleep, when she got up and look at the phone the screen was blue, she plugged it out and that was it, nothing else, it just died.  To make matters worse I'm in Jamaica, so even if I wanted to return it, its more expensive to ship back to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: NOT FULLY FUNCTIONAL
Reviews.Author: Mr. Terence J. Dalton
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED THIS ITEM TO UPDATE AN OLD LG THAT I OWNED. IT WAS A VERY GOOD PHONE BUT UNFORTUNATELY THE BOTTOM LINE ON THE QWERTY KEYBOARD DID NOT OPERATE CONSISTENTLY. THEREFORE RETURNED THIS PHONE.

Reviews.Title: Not totally as expecyed
Reviews.Author: Carol A. Madsen "Loves Christmas"
Reviews.Content: Never figured out how to use it properly, I guess.  It always turned itself off after just a few seconds and I felt like I was totally turning it on all the time..

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Louisa
Reviews.Content: ehhhhh product works but the features aren't what I expected and I ended up going to a different phone for my taste

Reviews.Title: NOT UPTO THE MARK
Reviews.Author: Satish Goparaju
Reviews.Content: Subject says it all.RAM is very low and hence unable to operate multiple applications simultaneously.Internal storage is very very low.""Whatsapp"" is not working from the DAY 1 and unable to uninstall as it being a pre-installed application.I will be more happy if you can provide me any solution for :whatsapp" to run

Reviews.Title: B606 android 2.3
Reviews.Author: JC "James Brown"
Reviews.Content: It works as well as can be expected for the price. magic jack works good but skype will not work at times.wifi is ok but not much range. but great for mail, weather and web search. If you do not have a smart phone...its better than nothing.

Reviews.Title: Bad Product
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: I bought this  cell phone  for  my  daughter , one  week and  the  problems  started  unstable , re start one and one time , don;t accepted  the slim card correctly . for  this  problem I returned  the  product .

Reviews.Title: not true android
Reviews.Author: hani asad
Reviews.Content: dont have android installed its just a copy phone freez as soon you insert the sd card and non of the apps opens in the main screen cause its just a copy not partitioned very bad i dont recommend it for free even

Reviews.Title: every on who saw it loved it and not i have to order 3 more next week
Reviews.Author: nicola bethel
Reviews.Content: it was great the only problem i have is the phone keeps force closing on me an i have to keep cutting the phone off to boot it up when ever this happens ohter than that the phone was good!

Reviews.Title: Product is not fancy but does it all (most of it)
Reviews.Author: Concertive Son
Reviews.Content: For around $50, this product brand new does a lot but not as well as LG or Samung.  What's great is good:- Good as a phone- Great that it can support two SIM cards simultaneously- WiFi works great- Blutooth works great- daytime camera is OK- Videos work OK- texting OKDeficiencies:- no flash for camera or flashlight- screen is smaller than an LG or Samsung, making texting more difficult to type

Reviews.Title: Love the Dual Sim capabilities
Reviews.Author: SM
Reviews.Content: Love the Dual Sim capabilities, bought this for my family members who live in a country where almost everyone has 2 or more cell phones, they love this.

Reviews.Title: Phone doesn't charge...
Reviews.Author: Kaitlynn W.
Reviews.Content: The phone overall, is good but when the phone dies, and it turns off, it won't let you charge it. The picture that comes on when you try to turn it on flashes on and off, so when that happened I sent that back and got a new one, and the first day I had it the same thing happened. So if you want to deal with that then yeah, get it. I don't really recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: GPS Works...sort of
Reviews.Author: James Bradshaw
Reviews.Content: A common complaint about this phone is that while GPS is listed as a feature, it doesn't work.  While it's not easy to get it to behave, there is a GPS receiver in the phone and it does work as long as you're outside and the sky is relatively clear (again, not ideal).The screen is quite small and typing is difficult, but I'm getting used to it.  I highly recommend buying an SD card at the same time the phone is purchased, as it's pretty much required to make the phone useful.  This is my first time purchasing an unlocked smartphone, and the pricepoint makes this phone a great deal for me.

Reviews.Title: Fast, but keyboard is way too small for me to use
Reviews.Author: Kristin
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone from another site. I have little hands, but the keyboard on it is way too small for me!

ProductInfo.Features:
Quad Band - Guaranteed to work on all four GSM Bands: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz - unique world quadband mobile phone
Unlocked - No Contract Required. Compatible with any GSM Network in the US and Worldwide, including but not limited to AT&T; / Cingular, T-Mobile, Rogers AT&T;, Fido, Suncom, etc.
Giant 5.0 inch ultra-definition flat resistive touch screen
Other Functions: Tasks,Calendar,Alarm, World Clock,Stopwatch,Timer,Sound/Video Recorder, FM Radio, Gallery, , Calculator, , Ebook Reader, Music/Video player,Flashlight,Handsfree, Bluetooth, GPRS / WAP, MMS, Expand  memory
this phone does not have WiFi. Internet is through your carrier's data plan.
ProductInfo.Name: SVP Unlocked 5 inch Dual SIM Camera GSM 850 900 1800 1900 BT Touch Cell Phone (black-c6)
